articles.title: New Brunswick announces no new cases of coronavirus for 3rd time in 4 days - Global News
articles.description: In a press release Sunday, the province said the number of cases detected in New Brunswick remains at 118.
articles.content:
For the third time in the past four days, New Brunswick is reporting no new cases of the novel coronavirus.
Of the 118 cases, 66 are travel-related, 42 are close contacts of confirmed cases and 10 are the result of community transmission.
